channel.title: A small GFX problem

item.title: A small GFX problem
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

yer… for my uhmmm you DONT need to know. but, in all sence, here it is, you stand in the center of these four objects, im testing the gfx only in one direction. heres what happens, the first gfx will apear ON object, probably a glow or something. Then, i have an int, and the Command im using to test, i have graphics timer.

here is the command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("SC")) { graphicstimer = 2; if(graphicstimer <= 2){ staticAnimation(580, absX+3, absY, 100); graphicstimer -= 1; } else if(graphicstimer <= 1){ staticAnimation(580, absX+2, absY, 100); graphicstimer -= 1; } else if(graphicstimer <= 0){ staticAnimation(580, absX+1, absY, 100); graphicstimer = 0; } }

not sure if what im doing is correct…

but yeh, after the gfx is started, a split second later, the new gfx apears one X space closer. but its not working >_<

Read full topic
